<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
<color=orange>Tentacled species</color> study
2
1
THATCH: The bodies of these organisms are almost completely (up to 95%) composed of water! How fascinating...
3 2
PLUME: They do not appear to have many organs to possess wisdom, though they do have sensory organs that appear to detect light and reflexively move away from danger.
4 3
COLEUS: They also have organs which produce a potent amount of bioelectricity across their entire body! The live species we met <color=orange>on the surface</color> during our first expedition were positively ecstatic to welcome us.
GM_EX2 4
